title: Support Strategies for Refugee Learners in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Intermediate Language Proficiency
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning support in limited-technology environments, with customized content for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize basic functions of online learning platforms with 90% accuracy
Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans in mobile environments at least three times.
Learners can perform collaborative learning activities with peers using digital communication tools at least twice.
Learners acquire at least 10 expressions applicable to real-world work scenarios through language learning projects.
Learners can independently resolve at least 70% of technical issues encountered during the learning process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
